name: heeq2
params: class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wi(wceq(c0, c1), wb(whe(c2, c0), whe(c2, c1)))

stmt.origin: mpan(wceq(c0, c1), wb(whe(c2, c0), whe(c2, c1)), wceq(c2, c2))

body.origin:
|- wi(wceq(c0, c1), wb(whe(c2, c0), whe(c2, c1)))
-| wceq(c2, c2)
-| wi(wa(wceq(c2, c2), wceq(c0, c1)), wb(whe(c2, c0), whe(c2, c1)))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 = c1 →(c2[hereditary]c0 ↔ c2[hereditary]c1))
⊣ c2 = c2
⊣ ((c2 = c2 ∧ c0 = c1)→(c2[hereditary]c0 ↔ c2[hereditary]c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wceq(c0, c1), wb(whe(c2, c0), whe(c2, c1)))
-| wceq(c2, c2)
-| wi(wa(wceq(c2, c2), wceq(c0, c1)), wb(whe(c2, c0), whe(c2, c1)))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 = c1 →(c2[hereditary]c0 ↔ c2[hereditary]c1))
⊣ c2 = c2
⊣ ((c2 = c2 ∧ c0 = c1)→(c2[hereditary]c0 ↔ c2[hereditary]c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wceq(c0, c1), wb(whe(c2, c0), whe(c2, c1)))
-| wi(wa(wceq(c2, c2), wceq(c0, c1)), wb(whe(c2, c0), whe(c2, c1)))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 = c1 →(c2[hereditary]c0 ↔ c2[hereditary]c1))
⊣ ((c2 = c2 ∧ c0 = c1)→(c2[hereditary]c0 ↔ c2[hereditary]c1))

body.origin: |- wi(wa(wceq(c2, c2), wceq(c0, c1)), wb(whe(c2, c0), whe(c2, c1)))

cumulated.origin: |- wi(wceq(c0, c1), wb(whe(c2, c0), whe(c2, c1)))

comment: Equality law for relations being herditary over a class. (Contributed by RP, 27-Mar-2020.)
